text: Kiran Manisha Mohanty (born 9 April 1989) is an Indian chess player.Kiran, Manisha Mohanty FIDE Chess Profile – Players Arbiters Trainers. Ratings.fide.com (24 April 2010). Retrieved on 2017-04-14. She holds the title of Woman Grandmaster. She was the Runners up in Asian Junior Girls Championship held at New Delhi in 2006. ==Achievements== * Runners up in Asian Junior Girls Chess Championship, New Delhi in 2006 * First Woman Chess player from Odisha to achieve Woman International Masters (2006), Woman's National 'B' title (2007), and Woman Grand Master (2010). == See also == * Tania Sachdev * Koneru Humpy * Harika Dronavalli * Nadig Kruttika * Eesha Karavade * Padmini Rout == References == == External links == * * Category:Living people Category:Indian female chess players Category:Chess woman grandmasters Category:1989 births Category:Sportswomen from Odisha Category:Recipients of the Ekalavya Award Category:Sportspeople from Bhubaneswar Category:21st- century Indian women
title: Kiran Manisha Mohanty
